# center

**Interface Property**

The map coordinate at the center of the map view.

## Declaration

```swift
center?: Coordinate;
```

## Discussion

There’s no default value.

## Controlling the visible portion of the map

- **visibleMapRect**: The visible area of the map, in map units.
- **region**: The area the map is displaying.
- **rotation**: The map’s rotation, in degrees.
- **tintColor**: The CSS color that MapKit JS uses for the user interface controls on the map.
